Sick of your home looking tired?
Over the next few weeks, I’ll show you how to transform any room from drab to fab in less than 15 minutes!
1 minute per couch
The easiest way to redecorate your lounge is to get some couch covers. For a fraction of the cost of reupholstering, they completely change the look of your lounge suite while hiding damage to the existing upholstery. Couch covers are a decorator’s dream because they’re made from luxurious fabrics in a beautiful ruffled style that stretches to fit over any style of couch.
Click to see HomeChoice’s range of couch covers
1 minute per couch
The easiest way to redecorate your lounge is to get some couch covers. For a fraction of the cost of reupholstering, they completely change the look of your lounge suite while hiding damage to the existing upholstery. Couch covers are a decorator’s dream because they’re made from luxurious fabrics in a beautiful ruffled style that stretches to fit over any style of couch.
Click to see HomeChoice’s range of couch covers
5 minutes
You can take your makeover further by creating a focal point. This can be done by simply putting a vase of flowers on a coffee table or hanging a picture. What I like to do is make the windows the focal point of the room, because who needs artwork when you have a small garden or a beautiful sky to look at? Draw attention to your windows by adding bold, detailed curtains. The effect is most powerful in a modern lounge that’s free from clutter.
Click to see HomeChoice’s range of lounge curtains

5 minutes
You can take your makeover further by creating a focal point. This can be done by simply putting a vase of flowers on a coffee table or hanging a picture. What I like to do is make the windows the focal point of the room, because who needs artwork when you have a small garden or a beautiful sky to look at? Draw attention to your windows by adding bold, detailed curtains. The effect is most powerful in a modern lounge that’s free from clutter.
Click to see HomeChoice’s range of lounge curtains
5 minutes
I have one more tip to make your lounge look good and work better for you. Store away anything that gets in your way or isn’t pleasant to look at. A great idea is to invest in some multi-functional furniture that doubles as storage or if your lounge doubles as a bedroom, getting a sleeper couch will make your space much more versatile and visitor-friendly.
Click to see HomeChoice’s storage solutions
5 minutes

See how quick and easy it can be to give your home a mini makeover? If this blog post has inspired you to refresh your lounge, remember to share your ‘before’ and ‘after’ photos with HomeChoice on Facebook or Instagram. I’m excited to see what you can do!
LERATO TSHABALALA
Interior Decorator Extraordinaire
Lerato is an independent Interior Decorator who helps style the HomeChoice showrooms. She’s passionate about making homes beautiful on a tight budget. Living in a flat with her sister and three young nephews has taught her how to make small spaces feel big enough for the whole family.
